message:
1823952{:}
Hello everyone and thank you for updating to version 0.4.0!
This message tab will be used for asset messages and broadcasts in a future update,
but it will also be used to relay important developer messages.
If you do not wish to receive these messages, you may disable them by going to:

Tools>Preferences>Messages

If you do not wish to see this tab, you can disable it by going to:

View>Hide Messages
